text: @realDonaldTrump Every day you say and do more loathsome things! Does the resident White House Nazi, Stephen Miller, have a script for you, Donald, or does it just come naturally? FYI, I would swim through a sea of coronavirus dressed in personal protective equipment to vote against you! RESIGN!
